Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all activity executions in the VINST incident and problem management log
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' occurrences across all cases
Percentage of process variants containing 'Accepted + Wait' relative to total variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' directly followed by 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + Resolved' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' that occur after 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' appearing in variants that eventually lead to 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + Closed' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' compared to the frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - User'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all 'Accepted + Wait - User'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' in variants with total performance duration above the median variant duration
Percentage of cases where 'Accepted + Wait' appears at least once before 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' occurring without any subsequent 'Accepted + In Progress' activity
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Accepted + In Progress' does not occur

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' relative to the combined frequency of all 'Accepted + Wait - *' subtypes (e.g., 'Accepted + Wait - User', 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor', 'Accepted + Wait - Implementation')
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of variants starting with 'Accepted + In Progress' and later including 'Accepted + Wait' before termination
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Accepted + In Progress' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' activities that are part of variants ending in 'Completed + Closed' versus those ending in 'Completed + Cancelled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all 'Completed + Closed'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' appearing between two 'Accepted + In Progress' activities
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Accepted + In Progress' occurs

Name: Percentage of total process execution time attributable to waiting segments initiated by 'Accepted + Wait' in high-frequency variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases
